value.title: Can What If parameters help in Power BI reports?
value.excerpt: Patrick looks at the What if parameters in Power BI Desktop to help you solve interesting questions in your Power BI reports.   Guy in a Cube courses: https://guyinacu.be/courses  ******** LET'S CONNECT! ********  -- http://twitter.com/guyinacube -- http://twitter.com/awsaxton -- http://twitter.com/patrickdba

value.title: Do you need a date table for time intelligence in Power BI? Nope! (Quick Measures)
value.excerpt: Everyone tells you that you need a date table for time intelligence in Power BI. Not so fast! Patrick shows you how you can use quick measures, like year over year, with a quick measure and no date table!  Download Sample: https://guyinacu.be/quickmeasuresample  ðŸ“¢ Become a member: https://guyinacu.be/membership

value.title: Dynamic filtering with Power BI
value.excerpt: In this video, Patrick looks at taking URL filtering to the next level. He shows how to use dynamic filtering with Power BI reports. He also shows a neat trick of setting a link image for Web URL fields.  Filtering in Power BI: https://powerbi.microsoft.com/en-us/blog/filter-a-report-with-a-url-query-string-parameter/

value.title: Dynamically change chart axis in Power BI
value.excerpt: In this video, Patrick builds on a blog post from Scott Senkeresty to dynamically change the axis of your visual within Power BI. This uses a combination of Power Query and DAX.  Chris Cook - @Finalyst89  Scott Senkeresty â€“ @ScottSenkeresty  Dynamically changing chart axis http://tinylizard.com/dynamically-changing-chart-axis/

value.title: Easily get an access token for the Power BI Embedded Playground
value.excerpt: You need an Embed Token for the Power BI Embedded Playground, but you don't want to write code. Adam shows you how to easily get an access token with no code using PowerShell.  Power BI Embedded Playground - https://microsoft.github.io/PowerBI-JavaScript/demo/ Power BI REST API - https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/power-bi/

value.title: Embed a dashboard from Power BI into your application
value.excerpt: In this video, I go over the embed a dashboard sample and walk you through how to actually embed a dashboard into your application. This uses a combination of the Power BI REST APIs and the JavaScript API.  Embed Dashboards in Your Applications to Monitor Your Business in Context (Blog) - https://powerbi.microsoft.com/en-us/blog/embed-dashboard/

value.title: Enabling Drillthrough with Power BI On-Object Editing
value.excerpt: Using the new On-Object editing in Power BI Desktop? Have you figured out how to enable drillthrough yet? Adam has and is here to show you the clicks! value.title: Exploring the Visio visual in Power BI
value.excerpt: Want to explore locations with data? The Visio visual in Power BI helps you do just that! Patrick looks at how to set it up and help use your data to highlight areas within a Visio diagram.  Download Sample: https://guyinacu.be/visiosample  Documentation: https://support.microsoft.com/office/add-visio-visuals-to-power-bi-reports-4f09be62-f436-45c2-93b0-4a0f66b1f5a7

value.title: Power BI dataflows vs datamarts: What's the difference???

Introduction to datamarts https://docs.microsoft.com/power-bi/transform-model/datamarts/datamarts-overview  Comparing dataflows to datamarts
